pageContent: Background: We used population-based data from the New South Wales Central Cancer Registry (CCR) to describe the patterns of progression to metastatic disease in Australian men diagnosed with non-metastatic prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
[Results of ureterocystoneostomy for inner urinary diversion in locally advanced prostate carcinoma]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/9738288/
